snippet: FIFA and World Cup officials faced questions about security Monday after two incidents kept ticketed fans out of one match until after it had begun and nearly allowed fans without tickets to force their way into another.
abstract: FIFA and World Cup officials faced questions about security after two incidents keep ticketed fans out of one match until after it had begun and nearly allowed fans without tickets to force their way into another.
lead_paragraph: FIFA and World Cup officials faced questions about security Monday after two incidents kept ticketed fans out of one match until after it had begun and nearly allowed fans without tickets to force their way into another.

headline.main: Ticketless Fans Breach Security Gate at World Cup
